page.subtitle: Over three years of web development experience. I independently develop components and web pages of any complexity. I code quickly, validly, responsively, semantically, and cross-browser. Currently ready to transition to a project using React (Next.js). I am looking forward to interesting projects and opportunities for professional growth and development.

current.name: Frontend Developer
current.ditail: Development and support of an online jewelry store. Implementation of tasks to meet business needs: landing pages, authorization blocks, form validation, messenger, sliders, drag-and-drop sorting, lazy loading, etc. Optimization of page loading speed.

previous.name: Frontend Developer / Markup developer
previous.ditail: Semantic, responsive, cross-browser layout. Development of components and pages of varying complexity using native js with libraries and plugins. Development of complex animations using js+css.

contribution.name: My Contribution to the Project:
contribution.value: Developed a messenger in pure js with lazy loading, message and chat title search functionality, chat archiving, and file attachment capabilities. Expanded functionality of the site builder. Developed drag-and-drop sorting functionality for favorite products. Developed functionality for binding products together into sets. Migrated Google Maps to a modern library. Replaced outdated jQuery libraries with modern plugins.

contribution.name: My Contribution to the Project:
contribution.value: Reduced main page and product card loading speed by migrating from slick-slider(jQuery) to swiper-slider(native js). Developed front end of the calculator table for product selection.

steck.name: Stack
steck.value: React.js, redux-toolkit, TypeScript, Rest API, react-persist, react-router-dom v.6, style-module

contribution.name: My Contribution to the Project:
contribution.value: Developed an application from scratch to work with data received from the API.

contribution.name: My Contribution to the Project:
contribution.value: Developed a multi-page site adhering to responsive, semantic, and cross-browser layout principles.

steck.name: Stack
